titles.title: Medicaid Catastrophic Protection Amendments of 1987

A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require States to provide for payment of medicare premiums, deductibles, and cost-sharing for medicare beneficiaries with incomes at or below the poverty level.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 3/23/1987--Introduced. Medicaid Catastrophic Protection Amendments of 1987 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to require States to provide Medicaid coverage of Medicare (title XVIII of the Act) premiums, deductibles, and coinsurance payments for which Medicare-eligible individuals whose income does not exceed the Federal poverty level would otherwise be accountable.
